favourite.article: Thank you so much for this God given resources for all ages.
Love this song... Thank the Lord.
I love this program. It talks about God and His beautiful grace and the love God gave us and that He is powerful than anything.
This song brought tears in my eyes...oh how much God loved me, He sent His Son.
Soli Deo Gloria, The main purpose of our life is to glorify the Lord and enjoying Him forever and ever.
Thank you much!! This is an awesome song for all.
Amen. It is a wonderful hymn.
Amen. It is a nice hymn.
Amen, I love the Bible too, especially the Recovery Version. Amen.
I just love this internet site. It is truly a blessing for my spirit to sing the scriptures. Thank you for having this at my reach today.

Hi I'm listening this hym in internet and I saw this comment fr Aliya I live in Goose Creek SC I am looking for any saints lives here in SC. I am very thirsty in spirit, whoever reading this comment lives in SC my e-mail nethsuiza@yahoo.com Thank you
i love your website because it talks about Lord Jesus
